scripts.seed:demo: node -e "process.env.NODE_ENV='development'; process.env.SEED_DEMO_USERS='1'; const { seedDatabase } = require('./seed'); const result = seedDatabase(); console.log('Seed demo completado. Usuarios demo creados: ' + result.createdUsers);"
scripts.seed:prod: node -e "process.env.NODE_ENV='production'; process.env.SEED_DEMO_USERS='0'; require('./seed').seedDatabase(); console.log('Seed prod completado. Usuarios demo deshabilitados y bootstrap admin evaluado.');"
